LoginPage.emailInvalid: The email address entered is invalid. Please check and try again

SignInPage.title: Sign-In Portal
SignInPage.emailInvalid: The email address entered is invalid. Please check and try again

AdDetailPage.name: Name
AdDetailPage.SendMessageAdvertiser: Send a Message to the Advertiser

AdFormPage.title: Title
AdFormPage.titleMax: Please provide a title that does not exceed the maximum length of 60 characters
AdFormPage.descriptionMax: Please provide a description that does not exceed the maximum length of 200 characters
AdFormPage.arrivalDateAfterDepartureDate: Arrival date must be after departure date
AdFormPage.collectionDateAfterDepartureDate: Collection date must be after departure and arrival date
AdFormPage.uploadPhotoItem: Upload a photo of your item
AdFormPage.titleTooltip: The title is what grabs the attention of other users. Make sure it accurately reflects the content of your ad.
AdFormPage.titleEx: Ex: 10 kg available for transport from Moncton to Niamey
AdFormPage.descriptionTooltip: Provide a detailed description of the item you're offering. Be clear about the size, condition, and any other relevant information. Keep it concise but informative.
AdFormPage.descriptionEx: Ex: 10 kg available for transport, various items (clothes, books, small objects) from Moncton to Niamey, packed and ready to be shipped.
AdFormPage.spaceAvailableTooltip: Enter the number of kilos or available space for transport. For example, 5 kg of clothes, 10 kg of miscellaneous items. Make sure the space matches what you can actually transport.
AdFormPage.spaceAvailableEx: Ex: 5 kg of clothes, 10 kg of miscellaneous items
AdFormPage.priceTooltipe: Enter the price you want for the transport. Make sure it is reasonable based on the weight, distance, and type of items. Example: $50 for 10 kg of clothes.
AdFormPage.departureCountryTooltip: Select the country from which the item will be shipped. This helps organize the transport based on the departure location.
AdFormPage.arrivalCountryTooltip: Select the country where the item should be delivered. This will help organize the transport based on the destination.
AdFormPage.departureCityTooltip: Select the city from which the item will be shipped. This helps organize the transport based on the departure location.
AdFormPage.arrivalCityTooltip: Select the city where the item should be delivered. This helps organize the transport based on the destination.
AdFormPage.departureDateTooltip: Select the date when you will start your journey. People will need to bring their items before this date.
AdFormPage.collectionDateTooltip: Select the date when you will arrive at your destination. From this date, senders can send their family members or friends to pick up the items.
AdFormPage.arrivalDateTooltip: Select the date when you will arrive at your destination. This will let senders know when the item will be available for pickup.
AdFormPage.categoryTooltip: Select the category that matches the items you can transport. This will help senders know what type of items can be sent with you.

SessionExpiredPage.title: Session Expired
SessionExpiredPage.textSessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
